translation.it: e poi un governo

translation.en: which included the East Timorese leaders.
translation.it: un gabinetto di leader.

translation.en: And he never took a decision that the East Timorese disagreed with.
translation.it: E non ha mai preso una decisione con cui Timor Est non fosse d'accordo.

translation.en: East Timor will have an elected representative body
translation.it: Timor Est avrà un organo rappresentativo eletto

translation.en: working for the people to frame a constitution
translation.it: che lavorerà per il popolo per delinare una costituzione

translation.en: that is of the people.
translation.it: che appartenga al popolo.

translation.en: This is a momentous achievement.
translation.it: È un traguardo epocale.

translation.en: Democracy looks to be in a very healthy state indeed.
translation.it: La democrazia sembra essere in forma.

translation.en: [Larriera] The real first time when I talked to Sérgio
translation.it: La prima volta che ho parlato davvero con Sérgio

translation.en: was at a formal dinner.
translation.it: fu a una cena formale.

translation.en: I arrived very early, and, um...
translation.it: Sono arrivata prestissimo e, a quanto pare,

translation.en: it turned out that the only person who was there,
translation.it: l'unica persona presente,

translation.en: the first person who was there was Sérgio.
translation.it: la prima ad arrivare, fu Sérgio.

translation.en: No one else was there, so we... started chatting away.
translation.it: Non c'era nessun altro, così abbiamo iniziato a chiacchierare.

translation.en: He told me that he knew I was from Argentina, and that, uh,
translation.it: Mi disse che sapeva che ero argentina e che lui

translation.en: he had spent the first days of his life in Argentina, in Buenos Aires,
translation.it: aveva trascorso i primi anni di vita in Argentina, a Buenos Aires,

translation.en: and I was surprised to hear that.
translation.it: e fu una sorpresa per me.

translation.en: As he was telling me this, he was drifting away in memories,
translation.it: Mentre mi diceva questo, si allontanava nei ricordi,

translation.en: until everyone suddenly arrived and our conversation was cut short.
translation.it: finché all'improvviso arrivarono gli altri e finimmo di parlare.

translation.en: It was that time, it was that day that we had really, you know...
translation.it: Fu in quel momento, quel giorno che si creò un legame

translation.en: established a connection and liked each other.
translation.it: e iniziammo a piacerci.

translation.en: He had told me he was separated, you know,
translation.it: Mi aveva detto di essere separato,

translation.en: and I assumed that that was a legal separation.
translation.it: e immaginai che fosse una separazione legale.

translation.en: It was later on that he told me that he was not legally separated.
translation.it: Più tardi, mi disse di non essere separato legalmente.

translation.en: But I must say that in the beginning he was not, you know...
translation.it: Ma devo dire che all'inizio non era stato...

translation.en: You know,
translation.it: ecco,

translation.en: hundred percent clear from that.
translation.it: chiaro al 100%.

translation.en: [Power] Sérgio had gotten married very young to Annie
translation.it: Sérgio si era sposato molto giovane con Annie

translation.en: and I don't think when he had his two sons that he would've forecast
translation.it: e quando ebbe due figli non penso che prevedesse

translation.en: that so much of his life would be spent away from his home in France.
translation.it: di trascorrere gran parte della vita lontano dalla casa in Francia.

translation.en: He was never a terribly faithful husband.
translation.it: Non era un marito terribilmente fedele.

translation.en: He had relationships outside his marriage,
translation.it: Aveva delle relazioni extra-matrimoniali,

translation.en: um, you know, couple of which were very, very public.
translation.it: un paio delle quali molto, molto pubbliche.

translation.en: Uh, in Cambodia, he had lived with his girlfriend
translation.it: In Cambogia, viveva con la sua ragazza

translation.en: and worked with her in the mission.
translation.it: lavorava con lei nella missione.

translation.en: It was clear to everybody with whom we worked that,
translation.it: Era chiaro a tutti i colleghi

translation.en: um, we had a relationship.
translation.it: che avevamo una relazione.

translation.en: It was, for me, very difficult because he was married
translation.it: Era molto difficile per me perché era sposato

translation.en: and we were clearly serious.
translation.it: e la nostra era una cosa seria.

translation.en: I never met his wife but I'm sure she knew.
translation.it: Non ho mai conosciuto sua moglie, ma sono certa che lo sapesse.

translation.en: Sérgio had an eye for women and, uh, enjoyed their company.
translation.it: A Sérgio piacevano le donne e ne apprezzava la compagnia.

translation.en: A lot.
translation.it: Molto.

translation.en: [Bos] It didn't last.
translation.it: Non è durata.

translation.en: But we stayed in touch, sort of, and through friends, uh, mutual friends.
translation.it: Ma siamo rimasti in contatto, tramite amici, amici in comune.

translation.en: Then I remember receiving an email from him that he sent
translation.it: Ricordo di aver ricevuto un'e-mail da lui,

translation.en: to his closest friends just before he left for Iraq.
translation.it: per gli amici più intimi, prima di partire per l'Iraq.

translation.en: He said, you know, "I'm so happy that I'm...
translation.it: Diceva: "Sono felice di entrare

translation.en: moving into a phase in my life where I'm...
translation.it: in una fase della mia vita in cui

translation.en: I'm starting to have a personal life, and I'm looking forward.
translation.it: inizio ad avere una vita privata e non vedo l'ora.

translation.en: This is going to be my last assignment and then...
translation.it: Questo sarà il mio ultimo incarico e poi

translation.en: I want to have a more normal lifestyle and start with Carolina."
translation.it: voglio avere uno stile di vita più normale insieme a Carolina."

translation.en: What I remember from that email was that he was ready to,
translation.it: Di quell'email ricordo che era pronto a sistemarsi

translation.en: to settle down and start enjoying life.
translation.it: e iniziare a godersi la vita.

translation.en: [Power] With Carolina, he was saying, "This is the woman I'm gonna marry."
translation.it: Di Carolina diceva: "Lei è la donna che sposerò."

translation.en: He was wearing a ring with her name on it.
translation.it: Portava un anello con sopra il suo nome.

translation.en: She was wearing a ring with his name on it.
translation.it: E lei lo stesso.

translation.en: He started legal proceedings to end his marriage,
translation.it: Avviò un procedimento legale per porre fine al matrimonio,

translation.en: and, uh, with a thought of beginning a new life with Carolina.
translation.it: con l'idea di iniziare una nuova vita con Carolina.

translation.en: He really wanted to have a second chance at having a family.
translation.it: Voleva davvero una seconda chance di avere una famiglia.

translation.en: [Galbraith] I think he did regret not having spent more time with his sons.
translation.it: Credo si sia pentito di non aver passato più tempo con i figli.

translation.en: On the other hand, it didn't change his behavior,
translation.it: D'altra parte, non cambiò il suo comportamento,

translation.en: and he felt drawn intellectually,
translation.it: si sentiva attratto intellettualmente

translation.en: uh, and emotionally to the work he was doing. He was ambitious.
translation.it: ed emotivamente dal lavoro che stava facendo. Era ambizioso.

translation.en: He was-- His career was very important to him.
translation.it: La carriera era molto importante per lui.

translation.en: And I think he also felt that he was doing good.
translation.it: E credo anche che fosse soddisfatto di sé.

translation.en: In that scheme of things, spending time with his sons
translation.it: In quello schema di cose, passare il tempo con i figli

translation.en: ended up being less, less important.
translation.it: finì col diventare sempre meno importante.

translation.en: But the truth is, had he been a family man,
translation.it: Ma la verità è che se fosse stato un padre di famiglia

translation.en: he would not have done,
translation.it: non avrebbe mai

translation.en: he could not have accomplished what he accomplished.
translation.it: fatto ciò che ha realizzato.

translation.en: [Larriera] All of a sudden, things just started falling into place.
translation.it: All'improvviso, le cose iniziarono ad andare al loro posto.

translation.en: Yes, independence will take place and yes, we are in love, and...
translation.it: Sì, l'indipendenza avrà luogo e sì, siamo innamorati e...

translation.en: You know, life cannot be better
translation.it: La vita non potrebbe essere

translation.en: than life at that moment in time.
translation.it: migliore di così.

translation.en: [Holbrooke] It was his success in East Timor
translation.it: Fu il suo successo a Timor Est

translation.en: that proved that he was at a unique level.
translation.it: a dimostrare che era di un altro livello.

translation.en: He inherited this war-torn, genocide-torn half an island,
translation.it: Aveva ereditato mezza isola devastata dalla guerra e dal genocidio,

translation.en: had presided over it, built it up, and handed it off
translation.it: l'aveva presieduta, edificata e restituita

translation.en: as an independent country.
translation.it: da paese indipendente.

translation.en: [Larriera] After the ceremony was finished,
translation.it: Dopo la cerimonia,

translation.en: several parties were taking place.
translation.it: si svolsero diverse feste.

translation.en: The President of the World Bank was toasting with President Clinton,
translation.it: Il presidente della Banca Mondiale brindava con il presidente Clinton,

translation.en: and many heads of state were in town.
translation.it: e c'erano molti capi di stato in città.

translation.en: He told me, "Carolina, I don't want to go to any party.
translation.it: Lui mi disse: "Carolina, non voglio andare a nessuna festa.

translation.en: I just want for the two of us to be together,
translation.it: Voglio solo stare insieme a te

translation.en: and let's do our own thing.
translation.it: per i fatti nostri.

translation.en: Why don't we go for a run?"
translation.it: Perché non andiamo a correre?"

translation.en: As we were running along, the Timorese were recognizing him.
translation.it: Mentre correvamo, i timoriani lo riconoscevano.

translation.en: They were saying, "Whoa, look. Here he comes."
translation.it: Dicevano: "Guardate. Eccolo."

translation.en: I could see Sérgio smiling from ear to ear,
translation.it: Potevo vedere Sérgio sorridere da un orecchio all'altro,

translation.en: waving his hand to the people, you know,
translation.it: agitava la mano verso la gente,

translation.en: as if he was waving bye-bye to East Timor.
translation.it: come se stesse dicendo addio a Timor Est.

translation.en: And many times afterwards, he will bring me back to that moment.
translation.it: E molte altre volte, mi riporterà a quel momento.

translation.en: He would take me back to that moment.
translation.it: Mi riportava a quel momento.

translation.en: "Tell me you remember that night when we went running, the taste of independence,
translation.it: "Dimmi che ti ricordi quando siamo andati a correre, il sapore dell'indipendenza,

translation.en: didn't it feel good? Didn't we do the right thing?"
translation.it: non è stato bello? Non abbiamo fatto la cosa giusta?"

translation.en: Let us examine the stand of the West and the United Nations in Indonesia
translation.it: Esaminiamo la posizione dell'Occidente e delle Nazioni Unite in Indonesia

translation.en: when they moved to divide the largest country in the Islamic world...
translation.it: quando divisero il più grande paese del mondo islamico...

translation.en: [in English] Osama bin Laden had issued a statement saying that, uh,
translation.it: Osama bin Laden aveva dichiarato che i jihadisti di tutto il mondo

translation.en: jihadis all over the world should take up arms not only against United States,
translation.it: dovevano imbracciare le armi non solo contro gli Stati Uniti,

translation.en: but against the United Nations.
translation.it: ma contro le Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Under no circumstances should any Muslim or sane person
translation.it: Per nessun motivo, un musulmano o una persona sana di mente

translation.en: resort to the United Nations.
translation.it: dovrà ricorrere alle Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: [in English] And the grounds for that appeal
translation.it: E i motivi di quell'appello erano

translation.en: was that the United Nations had helped dismember Indonesia,
translation.it: che le Nazioni Unite avevano aiutato a smembrare l'Indonesia,

translation.en: the largest Muslim country in the world,
translation.it: il più grande paese musulmano del mondo,

translation.en: and that it had pried away, uh, East Timor from this Muslim motherland, Indonesia,
translation.it: e che aveva allontanato Timor Est da questa madrepatria musulmana,

translation.en: and bin Laden was sending the signal the UN is a target.
translation.it: e bin Laden inviava il segnale: l'ONU è un bersaglio.

translation.en: It's not an unusual thing for the United Nations to be, uh, targeted
translation.it: Non è insolito che le Nazioni Unite venissero prese di mira

translation.en: when our objective in that country, I think,
translation.it: quando il nostro obiettivo in quel paese,

translation.en: which should be recognized by all,
translation.it: cosa che dovrebbe essere chiara,

translation.en: is to just help Iraqis get back on their feet.
translation.it: è aiutare gli iracheni a rimettersi in piedi.

translation.en: [reporter] A Special Representative of the UN, Sérgio de Mello,
translation.it: Un rappresentante speciale dell'ONU, Sérgio de Mello,

translation.en: was there in the compound when this truck bomb detonated
translation.it: era nel complesso quando la bomba è esplosa

translation.en: right below his window.
translation.it: proprio sotto la sua finestra.

translation.en: We still don't have any conformation about the extent of the injuries.
translation.it: Non abbiamo ancora conferma sull'entità delle ferite.

translation.en: We're still searching out more information about that. We are...
translation.it: Stiamo ancora cercando altre informazioni...

translation.en: [Valentine] I told ranking officers,
translation.it: Ho detto agli ufficiali di grado:

translation.en: I'd said, "Get me the heavy equipment, bull dozers, cranes...
translation.it: "Portatemi i mezzi pesanti, bulldozer, gru...

translation.en: Just find me anything."
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa."

translation.en: [William] Finally, somebody threw down a woman's purse,
translation.it: Finalmente qualcuno gettò una borsa da donna,

translation.en: and it was tied with a string
translation.it: ed era legata con un filo

translation.en: which looked like the kind of cord that you use on a set of drapes,
translation.it: che sembrava il tipo di cordoncino che usi su un set di tende,

translation.en: that they had tied together and that became what we used to haul the bricks up.
translation.it: legato assieme, e lo usammo per tirare su i mattoni.

translation.en: So I'd fill it with a half a dozen bricks
translation.it: La riempivo di cinque mattoni

translation.en: and these guys would haul it up to the third floor,
translation.it: e loro li tiravano su al terzo piano,

translation.en: throw it somewhere and they'd drop it back down
translation.it: li buttavano via e la calavano di nuovo giù

translation.en: and we'd throw a few more bricks in.
translation.it: per metterci altri mattoni.

translation.en: And this just kept going on and on.
translation.it: E questo continuò ad andare avanti.

translation.en: That went on for hours until there was enough room
translation.it: Andò avanti per ore finché non ci fu spazio a sufficienza

translation.en: for me to move Gil or Sérgio a little bit out of the way.
translation.it: per spostare Gil o Sérgio un po' di più.

translation.en: Sérgio did move a little bit,
translation.it: Sérgio si spostò un po',

translation.en: but every time I moved him, he was in agony,
translation.it: ma ogni volta che lo muovevo, era in agonia,

translation.en: and every time I moved him, the dirt and the walls were shifting.
translation.it: e ogni volta che lo spostavo, la terra e le pareti si muovevano.

translation.en: So I really had no means of supporting the walls up,
translation.it: Non avevo modo di reggere le pareti,

translation.en: because I didn't have two by fours, or four by fours or anything like that.
translation.it: perché non ne avevo un 2x4 o un 4x4 o simili.

translation.en: But this stuff didn't come fast enough.
translation.it: Non arrivavano in fretta.

translation.en: [William] There was no unity in command, no unity of effort.
translation.it: Non c'era unità al comando, nessuna unità di sforzo.

translation.en: Basically, you know, fire service in America, Canada, Western Europe
translation.it: I pompieri in America, Canada, Europa occidentale

translation.en: they're going to have shoring equipment, they're gonna have things that we can use
translation.it: hanno attrezzature di sostegno, qualcosa da poter usare

translation.en: to stabilize the building to get them out. We had nothing but our hands,
translation.it: er stabilizzare l'edificio e farli uscire. Noi avevamo solo le mani,

translation.en: a ladies purse and a string.
translation.it: una borsa da donna e un filo.

translation.en: At the base of the rubble pile, there were a couple of people milling around.
translation.it: Alla base del cumulo di macerie, c'erano delle persone che vagavano.

translation.en: One was a female.
translation.it: Una era una donna.

translation.en: She was missing a shoe. She had torn dress.
translation.it: Le mancava una scarpa. Aveva il vestito strappato.

translation.en: I don't know what language she was speaking, to be quite honest with you,
translation.it: Non so che lingua parlasse, sinceramente,

translation.en: but it wasn't English.
translation.it: ma non era inglese.

translation.en: She was told a number of occasions to go to the casualty collection point,
translation.it: Le dissero più volte di andare al punto di raccolta delle vittime,

translation.en: but she kept milling around.
translation.it: ma continuava ad andare in giro.

translation.en: [Larriera] I tell the soldiers, "Come on, you know, help me. Let's get him out.
translation.it: Dicevo ai soldati: "Forza, aiutatemi. Tiriamolo fuori.

translation.en: Let's get some shovels and start digging the debris out."
translation.it: Prendiamo delle pale e scaviamo i detriti."

translation.en: And he tells me, "There are no shovels."
translation.it: Lui mi dice: "Non ci sono pale."

translation.en: "Well, okay, let's do it, you know, with this piece of steel."
translation.it: "Ok, facciamolo con questo pezzo d'acciaio."

translation.en: He said, "No, no, no. We need to wait for equipment to come."
translation.it: E lui: "No, no. Dobbiamo aspettare che arrivi l'attrezzatura."

translation.en: "But where is equipment?
translation.it: "Ma dov'è l'attrezzatura?

translation.en: Who the hell is in charge?"
translation.it: Chi diamine comanda?"

translation.en: [Rice] I got a phone call saying that, uh,
translation.it: Mi hanno telefonato per dirmi che

translation.en: Sérgio de Mello had perhaps been very seriously wounded.
translation.it: forse Sérgio de Mello era rimasto ferito gravemente.

translation.en: That he was trapped and that they didn't know how serious the situation was.
translation.it: Che era intrappolato e che non sapevano quanto fosse grave la situazione.

translation.en: But then a few minutes later,
translation.it: Ma qualche minuto dopo,

translation.en: someone said, "Well, no, he'd been speaking,
translation.it: qualcuno disse: "No, parlava,

translation.en: and had been talking to people outside the building."
translation.it: parlava con persone fuori dall'edificio."

translation.en: And I remember just a sense of relief that, uh, perhaps this was all right.
translation.it: E ricordo solo un senso di sollievo, forse era tutto a posto.

translation.en: [Bremer] The President called and he said, "Well, please find out what happened."
translation.it: Il Presidente mi chiamò e disse: "Ti prego, scopri cos'è successo."

translation.en: And my Chief of Staff pulled me aside and he said,
translation.it: E il mio capo di stato maggiore mi prese da parte:

translation.en: "We don't know what's happened with Sérgio."
translation.it: "Non sappiamo cos'è successo a Sérgio."

translation.en: Um, "The last we heard he was alive,
translation.it: "Le ultime notizie lo danno vivo,

translation.en: but, you know, we just don't know what's going on.
translation.it: ma non sappiamo cosa sta succedendo.

translation.en: Um, he's trapped somewhere in the rubble."
translation.it: È intrappolato da qualche parte tra le macerie."

translation.en: Short time ago I spoke with Ambassador Bremer,
translation.it: Ho appena parlato con l'ambasciatore Bremer,

translation.en: directed him to provide all possible assistance
translation.it: chiedendogli di fornire tutta l'assistenza possibile

translation.en: to the rescue and recovery effort
translation.it: agli sforzi di salvataggio e recupero

translation.en: at the United Nations headquarters.
translation.it: al quartier generale delle Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: [man] Heads up.
translation.it: Attenzione.

translation.en: You ask questions or you want to hear from me?
translation.it: Fate voi le domande o volete sentire me?

translation.en: -[reporter] Both. -Yeah?
translation.it: - Entrambe. - Sì?

translation.en: [Rice] The President immediately took to him.
translation.it: Il Presidente lo prese subito in simpatia.

translation.en: He was eloquent.
translation.it: Era eloquente.

translation.en: He was committed.
translation.it: Ero motivato.

translation.en: He drew you in in the conversation with him.
translation.it: Ti attirava nella conversazione con lui.

translation.en: You just knew that this was somebody who could command a room.
translation.it: Sapevi che era qualcuno in grado di comandare.

translation.en: Secretary General,
translation.it: Segretario generale,

translation.en: distinguished members of the Council,
translation.it: illustri membri del Consiglio,

translation.en: friends,
translation.it: amici,

translation.en: I believe we have reason to be optimistic
translation.it: credo che abbiamo ragione di essere ottimisti

translation.en: about the future of Iraq.
translation.it: sul futuro dell'Iraq.

translation.en: But we have little margin for error.
translation.it: Ma abbiamo poco margine di errore.

translation.en: [in English] The United Nations' presence in Iraq remains vulnerable to
translation.it: La presenza delle Nazioni Unite in Iraq rimane vulnerabile

translation.en: any who would seek to target our organization.
translation.it: a chiunque voglia colpire la nostra organizzazione.

translation.en: Our security continues to rely significantly
translation.it: La sicurezza continua a contare in modo significativo

translation.en: on the reputation of the United Nations,
translation.it: sulla reputazione delle Nazioni Unite,

translation.en: our ability to demonstrate meaningfully that we are in Iraq to assist its people
translation.it: la nostra capacità di dimostrare che siamo in Iraq per aiutare la gente

translation.en: in our independence.
translation.it: nella nostra indipendenza.

translation.en: [Power] Sérgio hadn't wanted to go to Iraq in any deep way.
translation.it: Sérgio non voleva addentrarsi in Iraq.

translation.en: I mean, he liked being at the center of, uh, the action, always.
translation.it: Cioè, gli piaceva essere al centro dell'azione, sempre.

translation.en: He liked being the center of attention, always.
translation.it: Gli piaceva essere al centro dell'attenzione, sempre.

translation.en: But he was beginning to build a new life with Carolina
translation.it: Ma stava iniziando a costruire una nuova vita con Carolina

translation.en: and exhausted from East Timor,
translation.it: ed era esausto di Timor Est,

translation.en: coupled with the fact that he opposed the war in Iraq, to begin with,
translation.it: insieme al fatto che era opposto alla guerra in Iraq,

translation.en: but as soon as the question was posed, Sérgio did not feel like he could say no,
translation.it: ma non appena fu posta la domanda, Sérgio pensò di non poter dire di no,

translation.en: and of course tried to make the best of, uh, not an ideal situation.
translation.it: e ovviamente cercò di trarre il meglio da una situazione non ideale.

translation.en: [McNamara] I never forget him writing his speech for his landing in Baghdad.
translation.it: Non posso dimenticare che scrisse il discorso per il suo arrivo a Baghdad.

translation.en: I think he didn't have the press that he expected
translation.it: Credo che non avesse la stampa che si aspettava

translation.en: because Bremer had called a press conference for his own at the same time,
translation.it: perché Bremer aveva convocato una conferenza stampa nello stesso momento,

translation.en: so that sort of sabotaged a little bit,
translation.it: che l'ha sabotata un po',

translation.en: but he was pretty aware of a historic event,
translation.it: ma era consapevole dell'un evento storico,

translation.en: and I think also pretty aware
translation.it: e anche consapevole, credo,

translation.en: that he had an awful mandate from the Security Council.
translation.it: del pessimo incarico affidatogli dal Consiglio di Sicurezza.

translation.en: It wasn't a political management mission.
translation.it: Non era una missione di gestione politica.

translation.en: It wasn't a humanitarian mission.
translation.it: Non era una missione umanitaria.

translation.en: It was a compromised mission under the US occupation.
translation.it: Era una missione compromessa dall'occupazione americana.

translation.en: But if anyone could have achieved something
translation.it: Ma se qualcuno poteva ottenere qualcosa

translation.en: in that political hotchpotch mess of a situation,
translation.it: in quel guazzabuglio di guai politici,

translation.en: it would've been Sérgio.
translation.it: quello era Sérgio.

translation.en: Hi.
translation.it: Ciao.

translation.en: [Rishmawi] The first thing he wanted to do is to listen.
translation.it: La prima cosa che voleva fare era ascoltare.

translation.en: He went to Basra, Mosul, Erbil, all over. All over.
translation.it: Andò a Basra, Mosul, Erbil, dappertutto. Dappertutto.

translation.en: He was very attentive to how normal Iraqis were living day by day.
translation.it: Era molto attento a come gli iracheni vivevano giorno dopo giorno.

translation.en: Water, electricity.
translation.it: Acqua, elettricità.

translation.en: He saw it very much as a question of human dignity.
translation.it: La vedeva come una questione di dignità umana.

translation.en: What I do if I don't have money? What I do?
translation.it: Cosa faccio se non ho i soldi? Cosa faccio?

translation.en: I stole. Became a thief.
translation.it: Rubo. Divento un ladro.

translation.en: -No, don't do that. I understand-- -No, I am...
translation.it: - No, non farlo. Capisco... - No...

translation.en: I am a graduate from a university.
translation.it: Mi sono laureato all'università.

translation.en: [Salamé] Well, he didn't know much, but he did not pretend to know much.
translation.it: Beh, non sapeva molto, ma non fingeva di sapere.

translation.en: That was something that you'd immediately like about him that...
translation.it: Era una cosa che ti piaceva subito di lui:

translation.en: he was willing to listen, to learn.
translation.it: era disposto ad ascoltare, a imparare.

translation.en: We had an advantage.
translation.it: Avevamo un vantaggio.

translation.en: Everybody is in principle willing to talk to us,
translation.it: In linea di principio tutti sono disposti a parlare con noi,

translation.en: which was not the case with the Americans.
translation.it: cosa che non accadeva agli americani.

translation.en: [Sérgio] I am here to listen to you.
translation.it: Sono qui per ascoltarvi.

translation.en: I am here to learn.
translation.it: Sono qui per imparare.

translation.en: [Sérgio] Tell me frankly, how you believe the United Nations, myself,
translation.it: Ditemi, francamente, come pensate che le Nazioni Unite, io,

translation.en: and my colleagues can be helpful to you.
translation.it: e i miei colleghi possiamo esservi utili.

translation.en: [Larriera] Sérgio worked non-stop.
translation.it: Sérgio lavorava senza sosta.

translation.en: He was eternally optimistic that, uh,
translation.it: Era eternamente ottimista sul fatto che

translation.en: he and his team, single-handedly, and perhaps naively, um,
translation.it: lui e la sua squadra, da soli, e forse ingenuamente,

translation.en: could turn the tables around.
translation.it: potessero ribaltare le cose.

translation.en: [Bremer] We've had a very good first meeting with Mr. de Mello here,
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto un ottimo primo incontro con il signor de Mello,

translation.en: going over a very wide range of issues on which we can work together
translation.it: abbiamo discusso di molte questioni su cui possiamo lavorare insieme

translation.en: to help in our common objective which is producing an independent, democratic
translation.it: per il nostro obiettivo comune di creare un Iraq indipendente, democratico

translation.en: peaceful Iraq, and I think we have a very good sense...
translation.it: e pacifico, e credo che ci sia un ottimo...

translation.en: Sérgio saw nothing incompatible with trying to help the UN
translation.it: Sérgio non vedeva incompatibile cercare di aiutare le Nazioni Unite

translation.en: by helping the Iraqis, which in turn would help the United States.
translation.it: con l'aiutare gli iracheni, aiutando di conseguenza gli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: There wasn't any press briefing foreseen in our program.
translation.it: Non c'era una conferenza stampa prevista nel nostro programma.

translation.en: [Holbrooke] He was not an accomplice
translation.it: Non era complice

translation.en: to the terrible mistakes of the Bush administration.
translation.it: dei terribili errori dell'amministrazione Bush.

translation.en: He was doing what he could for the Iraqi people
translation.it: Faceva quello che poteva per gli iracheni

translation.en: in a typical Sérgio fashion.
translation.it: in tipico stile Sérgio.

translation.en: He was paying too little attention to the fact
translation.it: Prestava poca attenzione al fatto

translation.en: that he was at great personal risk
translation.it: che corresse un grave rischio personale

translation.en: precisely because the more effective he was
translation.it: proprio perché più era efficace

translation.en: the more he would be perceived by the enemies of the US
translation.it: più i nemici degli Stati Uniti avrebbero percepito

translation.en: as serving American interests.
translation.it: che facesse gli interessi americani.

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. de Mello,
translation.it: Signor de Mello,

translation.en: is there a real role to the United Nations
translation.it: le Nazioni Unite hanno un ruolo reale

translation.en: in the political process in Iraq
translation.it: nel processo politico in Iraq

translation.en: or it's just a cover to the American...
translation.it: o è solo una copertura per l'occupazione...

translation.en: American occupation?
translation.it: l'occupazione americana?

translation.en: Thank you. First of all, my friend, and answering your second question,
translation.it: Grazie. Prima di tutto, amico, e in risposta alla seconda domanda,

translation.en: the UN, its Secretary General,
translation.it: l'ONU, il Segretario Generale,

translation.en: and Sérgio Vieira de Mello, Representative of the Secretary General,
translation.it: e Sérgio Vieira de Mello, rappresentante del Segretario Generale,

translation.en: are no tool and no cover for anyone, all right?
translation.it: non siamo uno strumento né una copertura di nessuno, va bene?

translation.en: We are an independent organization.
translation.it: Siamo un'organizzazione indipendente.

translation.en: Secretary General Kofi Annan and myself are independent from anyone.
translation.it: Io e il segretario generale Kofi Annan siamo indipendenti.

translation.en: So don't suggest for a second that we are there supporting the United States
translation.it: Quindi, non osi insinuare che siamo qui per sostenere

translation.en: or the coalition, all right?
translation.it: gli Stati Uniti o la coalizione, ok?

translation.en: Once in the street, there were small pieces of paper in blue.
translation.it: Una volta, in strada comparvero dei pezzi di carta blu.

translation.en: Like, square ones in blue,
translation.it: Dei quadrati blu

translation.en: uh, that says "Al-Qaeda is now here," or something like that.
translation.it: con scritto: "Al-Qaeda è qui," o qualcosa del genere.

translation.en: Someone had been reportedly seen taking down the numbers of the license plates
translation.it: Qualcuno è stato visto rimuovere i numeri delle targhe

translation.en: of cars coming in and out of the compound.
translation.it: delle auto che entrano ed escono dal complesso.

translation.en: [William] As an anti-terrorism specialist,
translation.it: Come esperto antiterrorismo,

translation.en: I try to look at it from the terrorist point of view and I was thinking that,
translation.it: cerco di vederla dal punto di vista dei terroristi, e pensavo:

translation.en: you know, "If I was a terrorist,
translation.it: "Se fossi un terrorista,

translation.en: it would be so easy to drive a truck loaded with explosives down the driveway
translation.it: sarebbe facile guidare un camion carico di esplosivo nel vialetto

translation.en: and detonate it right next to the UN and blow it up."
translation.it: e farlo esplodere vicino all'ONU."

translation.en: I recommended strongly that they put in a large reinforced gate
translation.it: Avevo raccomandato di mettere un cancello rinforzato

translation.en: at the entrance to the Canal road driveway,
translation.it: all'ingresso del vialetto del Canal,

translation.en: but it was a very busy road and they were concerned the traffic
translation.it: ma era una strada molto trafficata e temevano che

translation.en: trying to get into the parking lot would queue up,
translation.it: la fila per entrare nel parcheggio

translation.en: and they'd have accidents and it would just be a mess and...
translation.it: avrebbe causato traffico, incidenti...

translation.en: I reported back that I thought, you know,
translation.it: Io riferii che fosse meglio

translation.en: it'd be better to have a few fender-bender accidents
translation.it: avere qualche tamponamento

translation.en: than have somebody drive a truck up the driveway and blow up the building.
translation.it: che un camion guidato nel vialetto e fatto esplodere.

translation.en: In lieu of the gate that I'd recommended,
translation.it: Al posto del cancello che avevo consigliato,

translation.en: the 2nd Cavalry had supplied them
translation.it: il 2° squadrone di cavalleria

translation.en: with a Bradley armored fighting vehicle and a crew,
translation.it: aveva fornito un veicolo corazzato Bradley e dei militari,

translation.en: and they were basically the valet parking.
translation.it: che facevano praticamente i parcheggiatori.

translation.en: Later on, I noticed the vehicle was gone
translation.it: Tempo dopo notai che il veicolo era sparito

translation.en: and there was nothing there except a roll of concertina wire across the driveway,
translation.it: e c'era solo un rotolo di filo spinato lungo il vialetto,

translation.en: and I was, like, "Uh-oh."
translation.it: e ho pensato: "Oh-oh."

translation.en: When I spoke to somebody at the UN, I said "What happened to it?"
translation.it: Quando ne parlai all'ONU, dissi: "Perché non c'è più?"

translation.en: And they said, "Oh, Sérgio ordered it moved." I'm, like, "Oh, Jesus."
translation.it: Risposero: "Oh, Sérgio ha ordinato di spostarlo." E io: "Cristo."

translation.en: He was trying to tone down the American presence at the UN compound,
translation.it: Voleva attenuare la presenza americana al complesso dell'ONU,

translation.en: so it didn't look like the UN was, you know, part of the coalition forces.
translation.it: per non far sembrare l'ONU parte delle forze di coalizione.

translation.en: The UN is ruled by the Jews and the Americans
translation.it: L'ONU è governata dagli ebrei e dagli americani

translation.en: and its crimes are flagrant in the Arab and Islamic world.
translation.it: e i suoi crimini sono flagranti nel mondo arabo e islamico.

translation.en: Zarqawi told me he needed to hit a big target - to recruit followers.
translation.it: Zarqawi mi disse che doveva colpire n grosso obiettivo per reclutare seguaci.

translation.en: Zarqawi said that the UN
translation.it: Zarqawi disse che l'ONU

translation.en: was a nest for secret services and American spies.
translation.it: era un covo di servizi segreti e spie americane.

translation.en: He said he needed to attack the UN
translation.it: Disse di dover attaccare le Nazioni Unite

translation.en: and kill that criminal Sérgio.
translation.it: e uccidere quel criminale di Sérgio.

translation.en: On that Monday, he told me that he...
translation.it: Quel lunedì mi disse di avere davvero bisogno

translation.en: he really needed something to look on to the future.
translation.it: di qualcosa per cui guardare avanti.

translation.en: We needed to get going and start planning immediately
translation.it: Dovevamo muoverci e iniziare subito

translation.en: on our next steps, on our next move.
translation.it: a pianificare la prossima mossa.

translation.en: And really our next move had been to go back to Brazil.
translation.it: E la prossima mossa era tornare in Brasile.

translation.en: Monday night he said, "Carolina, let's book the flights
translation.it: Lunedì notte disse: "Carolina, prenotiamo i voli

translation.en: and make sure that we have a clear exit strategy.
translation.it: e assicuriamoci di avere una chiara strategia di fuga.

translation.en: Because I need to be thinking that I'm going back to Brazil,
translation.it: Perché ho bisogno di pensare che torno in Brasile,

translation.en: I'm going back to Rio."
translation.it: che torno a Rio."

translation.en: We were six weeks away from leaving Baghdad.
translation.it: Fra sei settimane avremmo lasciato Baghdad.

translation.en: [William] They say time flies when you're having fun.
translation.it: Dicono che il tempo vola quando ci si diverte.

translation.en: Well, I certainly wasn't having fun but time was flying.
translation.it: Di sicuro non mi stavo divertendo, ma il tempo volava.

translation.en: And the golden hour, it came and went, we didn't even realize it.
translation.it: E l'ora d'oro venne e se ne andò, senza che ce ne accorgessimo.

translation.en: I'm tired, my legs and arms were cramping.
translation.it: Ero stanco, avevo i crampi alle gambe e alle braccia.

translation.en: We were driven, basically.
translation.it: Eravamo motivati.

translation.en: We were determined that these guys were not gonna die in this hole.
translation.it: Eravamo determinati a non morire in quel buco.

translation.en: I tried to get them into their, what I felt was their religious belief.
translation.it: Ho cercato di motivarli con le loro convinzioni religiose.

translation.en: [William] At one point Andre wanted to pray with Sérgio
translation.it: A un certo punto, Andre voleva pregare con Sérgio

translation.en: and he was still lucid enough to say if prayers...
translation.it: ed era ancora abbastanza lucido da dire...

translation.en: You know, this is not the time,
translation.it: Senti, non è proprio il momento.

translation.en: uh, which I think kind of [chuckles] upset Andre a little bit.
translation.it: Cosa che ha fatto Sto arrabbiare un po' Andre, secondo me.

translation.en: I asked him, you know, you got to have faith, you have to believe,
translation.it: Gli dissi che doveva avere fede, doveva credere,

translation.en: and he said, "Believe? Damn, God. God did this to me," you know.
translation.it: e lui: "Credere? Dio, maledetto. Dio mi ha fatto questo."

translation.en: "Curse God." He was using some other words that I will not say,
translation.it: "Dannato Dio." E qualche altra parola che non dico,

translation.en: um, and I was trying to tell him, "God didn't do this to you, man.
translation.it: e io cercavo di dirgli: "Non è stato Dio a farti questo.

translation.en: You have to have faith this strong
translation.it: Devi avere una fede così forte

translation.en: to believe that God could get you out of here.
translation.it: da credere che Dio possa tirarti fuori di qui.

translation.en: I'm you savior, in a sense.
translation.it: In un certo senso, sono il tuo salvatore.

translation.en: You have to believe in me."
translation.it: Devi credere in me."

translation.en: I've never had that experience.
translation.it: Non ho mai avuto un'esperienza così.

translation.en: In 35 years, nobody's ever said, "Hey, let's stop and pray."
translation.it: In 35 anni, nessuno ha mai detto: "Ehi, fermiamoci a pregare."

translation.en: What's so wrong with praying with somebody, you know?
translation.it: Che c'è di male a pregare con qualcuno?

translation.en: It, it, uh... It wouldn't have hurt.
translation.it: Non... non avrebbe fatto male.

translation.en: And Sérgio wanted no part of that, so, you know...
translation.it: E Sérgio non voleva farne parte,

translation.en: And he was... [chuckles]
translation.it: E diceva...

translation.en: expletive deleted "no," you know. He didn't want any part of that.
translation.it: Cancelliamo l'imprecazione. "No." Non voleva prestarsi.

translation.en: I'm not a big prayer guy either. I was, like, I don't know if I...
translation.it: Neanch'io prego molto. E dissi, non so se con tatto o meno:

translation.en: tactfully or untactfully said, "We haven't got time for this shit.
translation.it: "Non abbiamo tempo per queste stronzate.

translation.en: Prayer's great, we'll pray when we get him out. But let's get him out."
translation.it: Pregare è fantastico, ma pregheremo quando lo tiriamo fuori."

translation.en: [Larriera] There are some soldiers that told me to clear the area.
translation.it: Alcuni soldati mi dissero di evacuare la zona.

translation.en: I said, "No, no, no, I'm going there because I hear that Sérgio's there."
translation.it: E io: "No, no, vado lì perché ho sentito che c'è Sérgio."

translation.en: And the soldier comes to me and says,
translation.it: E il soldato venne da me e disse:

translation.en: "No, you know, you have to clear the area. You have to step back."
translation.it: "No, dobbiamo evacuare la zona. Deve spostarsi."

translation.en: And I said, "No, no."
translation.it: E io dissi: "No, no."

translation.en: After a period of time I started to figure out that
translation.it: Dopo un po' iniziai a capire

translation.en: maybe there was something going on between her and somebody in there.
translation.it: che forse c'era qualcosa tra lei e una persona lì dentro.

translation.en: She was close with him or something, I don't know.
translation.it: Era vicina a lui o qualcosa del genere.

translation.en: I could see she wanted to get up,
translation.it: Vedevo che voleva alzarsi

translation.en: and I though about it for a second and I said, "You know what?
translation.it: e ci pensai su un attimo e mi dissi: "Sai una cosa?

translation.en: Let them talk to each other."
translation.it: Facciamoli parlare."

translation.en: I gave her my hand, I let her come up,
translation.it: Le ho dato la mano, l'ho fatta salire,

translation.en: she put her head on the hole and started talking.
translation.it: lei si è affacciata al buco e ha iniziato a parlare.

translation.en: I put my ear and my mouth very close to the hole
translation.it: Ho messo l'orecchio e la bocca molto vicini al buco

translation.en: and I, I say...
translation.it: e ho detto:

translation.en: Sérgio, are you there?
translation.it: "Sérgio, sei lì?"

translation.en: And a very weak voice says, "Carolina, my love, I'm in pain, I'm here.
translation.it: E una voce molto debole disse: "Carolina, amore mio, ho male, sono qui.

translation.en: I love you."
translation.it: Ti amo."

translation.en: And I tell him I love him too...
translation.it: E gli ho detto che anch'io lo amavo,

translation.en: to be strong...
translation.it: di essere forte,

translation.en: and I'm going to get him out.
translation.it: e che l'avrei fatto uscire.

translation.en: At this point, Gil is reacting to some verbal stimuli, but not much.
translation.it: A quel punto, Gil reagiva ad alcuni stimoli verbali, ma non molto.

translation.en: You can't get really more than a word or two in reply.
translation.it: Non si rispondeva con più di una parola o due.

translation.en: We got to get him out, we know we got to get him out,
translation.it: Dovevamo tirarlo fuori,

translation.en: we got to get him out now.
translation.it: dovevamo farlo ora.

translation.en: But the problem is he's still pinned from his lower legs.
translation.it: Ma il problema è che era ancora bloccato dalle gambe in giù.

translation.en: Where Sérgio was, Gil had to be removed first.
translation.it: Si doveva prima togliere Gil.

translation.en: I said, "Buddy, you know, I've done the best I can,
translation.it: Dissi: "Sai, ho fatto del mio meglio,

translation.en: and if I don't get you out now, we're never gonna get out."
translation.it: e se non ti faccio uscire ora, non usciremo mai."

translation.en: So he said, "Do what you have to do,
translation.it: Così disse: "Fai quello che devi,

translation.en: and I just wanna live and I wanna go home."
translation.it: io voglio solo vivere e voglio tornare a casa."

translation.en: My memory of it is that, you know, I'm just not going to give in.
translation.it: Il mio ricordo è: non mi arrenderò.

translation.en: I'm not going to die. I have...
translation.it: Non morirò.

translation.en: a lot to live for, you know. I...
translation.it: Ho tanto per cui vivere.

translation.en: You know, I thought...
translation.it: Ho pensato

translation.en: [voice breaking] immediately of my family.
translation.it: subito alla mia famiglia.

translation.en: A decision was made and, uh, we all agreed on it,
translation.it: Prendemmo una decisione di comune accordo,

translation.en: and the most important thing was Gil was ready for it.
translation.it: e la cosa più importante era che Gil era pronto.

translation.en: The only thing they found me was an old rusty wood saw
translation.it: Mi hanno trovato solo una vecchia sega arrugginita

translation.en: and my trusty paramedic scissors.
translation.it: e le mie fidate forbici chirurgiche.

translation.en: I said, "I'm gonna start sawing away.
translation.it: Dissi: "Ora inizio a segare.

translation.en: If you have to scream out, scream out.
translation.it: Se devi urlare, urla.

translation.en: If the pain is unbearable, let me know and I will stop
translation.it: Se il dolore è insopportabile, dimmelo e mi fermo

translation.en: and give you some more pain medicine."
translation.it: e ti do altri antidolorifici."

translation.en: I don't remember any of that. I've... blacked that out.
translation.it: Non ricordo nulla di tutto ciò. Ho un black out.

translation.en: [Valentine] I started to cut through his first leg.
translation.it: Iniziai a tagliare la prima gamba.

translation.en: I had to kind of separate his screaming from what I had to do,
translation.it: Dovetti separare le sue urla da ciò che dovevo fare,

translation.en: 'cause I knew it had to be done.
translation.it: perché sapevo che era necessario.

translation.en: Even with morphine, even being deeply in shock
translation.it: Anche con la morfina, anche se era profondamente

translation.en: and basically reacting only to pain,
translation.it: sotto shock e reagiva solo al dolore,

translation.en: it was pretty gruesome work. Um...
translation.it: era un lavoro raccapricciante.

translation.en: He screamed. I mean, you probably could've heard the screams in, you know,
translation.it: Urlava. Penso che le urla si sentissero

translation.en: the green zone.
translation.it: anche nella zona verde.

translation.en: We felt terrible, but we knew if we didn't do this,
translation.it: È stato straziante, ma sapevamo che se non l'avessimo fatto,

translation.en: he would die where he was, because we physically couldn't get him out.
translation.it: sarebbe morto lì perché fisicamente non riuscivamo a farlo uscire.

translation.en: I pulled tighter on the tourniquet,
translation.it: Strinsi di più il laccio emostatico

translation.en: and I told him I'm gonna go to the second leg.
translation.it: e gli dissi che sarei passato all'altra gamba.

translation.en: He didn't answer for a while, for a few minutes, I thought I'd lost him.
translation.it: Per un po' non rispose, pensai di averlo perso.

translation.en: What I believe what happened was,
translation.it: Credo che il dolore

translation.en: the pain was so bad that it literally just knocked him out.
translation.it: fu così forte da stordirlo letteralmente.

translation.en: So, in a way, that was probably a blessing.
translation.it: Quindi, in un certo senso, fu una benedizione probabilmente.

translation.en: I started to cut into the second leg and he woke up again,
translation.it: Iniziai a tagliare la gamba e si svegliò di nuovo,

translation.en: and he started to moan and he just said, "Andre, I feel that,
translation.it: e iniziò a lamentarsi e disse: "Andre, lo sento,

translation.en: but go ahead and do it and finish."
translation.it: ma continua e finisci."

translation.en: Um, and I did. I finished cutting the second leg,
translation.it: E così feci. Finii di tagliare l'altra,

translation.en: pulled tighter on the tourniquet, and I bandaged it.
translation.it: strinsi il laccio emostatico e la fasciai.

translation.en: [William] We finally got a Sked.
translation.it: Finalmente ci hanno dato uno SKD.

translation.en: It's an acronym for something and I have no idea what it is,
translation.it: È un acronimo che sta per non so cosa,

translation.en: but it's this plastic roll-up thing
translation.it: ma è un rotolo di plastica

translation.en: that when you unroll it and lace the sides
translation.it: che quando lo srotoli e tiri i lati

translation.en: it forms a semi-rigid stretcher.
translation.it: diventa una barella semirigida.

translation.en: [Valentine] I got him in the best I can,
translation.it: L'ho fatto mettere lì come meglio potevo

translation.en: and the team up on top was just waiting on me to say go ahead and go.
translation.it: e la squadra di sopra aspettava che gli dicessi di andare.

translation.en: They pulled, and they pulled, and they pulled.
translation.it: Tirarono, tirarono e tirarono.

translation.en: The reinforcing rod was blocking one part of the small opening
translation.it: Il tondino bloccava una parte della piccola apertura

translation.en: and the body was blocking the other.
translation.it: e il corpo bloccava l'altra.

translation.en: We tried to pull the SKD past it, it wouldn't fit.
translation.it: Provammo a far passare lo SKD, ma non ci entrava.

translation.en: Since we never got the hacksaw, we couldn't move the reinforcing rod.
translation.it: Non avendo il seghetto, non potevamo spostare il tondino.

translation.en: So the only other way to get Gil up was to
translation.it: L'unico altro modo per sollevare Gil era

translation.en: remove the body that was pinned in the rubble
translation.it: rimuovere il corpo che era bloccato\

translation.en: part way up.
translation.it: parzialmente tra le macerie.

translation.en: So I had the unenviable task of, uh, using my combat knife again to, uh,
translation.it: Ebbi il compito non invidiabile di usare di nuovo il  coltello da combattimento

translation.en: cut the body in half so they could haul it.
translation.it: per tagliare il corpo in due così da poterlo trasportare.

translation.en: [exhales] And if you think cutting a leg off was fun...
translation.it: E se pensate che tagliare una gamba sia divertente,

translation.en: Uh, now even though the victim was dead and obviously deceased...
translation.it: anche se la vittima era ovviamente deceduta,

translation.en: it was still hard work.
translation.it: era un duro lavoro.

translation.en: [Valentine] And they finally got Gil up.
translation.it: Finalmente fecero salire Gil.

translation.en: I looked at him and I said, "Gil, you're free, you're home now.
translation.it: Lo guardai e dissi "Gil, sei libero, ora sei a casa.

translation.en: I'm gonna give you to my other guys and they will take you to the doctors."
translation.it: Ti darò agli altri ragazzi e ti porteranno dai dottori."

translation.en: [Loescher] My family was my anchor.
translation.it: La mia famiglia fu la mia ancora.

translation.en: I probably knew instinctively that if I got out of there...
translation.it: Probabilmente l'istintio mi diceva che se fossi uscito da lì

translation.en: that they would, uh...
translation.it: loro mi avrebbero aiutato

translation.en: [sighs] see me through my recovery.
translation.it: a guarire.

translation.en: He was close to death when they got him out there.
translation.it: Era vicino alla morte quando lo portarono fuori.

translation.en: His vital signs were, like, 60 over 40 for blood pressure,
translation.it: I suoi segni vitali erano circa 60 su 40 per la pressione sanguigna,

translation.en: uh, and they did a hot load
translation.it: e lo imbottirono per bene

translation.en: into one of the medivac helicopters and flew him away.
translation.it: lo misero su un elicottero di soccorso e lo portarono via.

translation.en: I spotted this man. I rushed to him and I asked him,
translation.it: Vidi un uomo. Corsi da lui e gli dissi:

translation.en: "Please, I need your help. I need your help.
translation.it: "La prego, ho bisogno del suo aiuto.

translation.en: My Sérgio is in the rubble, and he is going to die if...
translation.it: Il mio Sérgio è tra le macerie e morirà se...

translation.en: if we don't help him out."
translation.it: non lo aiutiamo."

translation.en: He told me, "I have news for you.
translation.it: Mi disse: "Ho una notizia per lei.

translation.en: Do you see that helicopter, the black copter that just left off?"
translation.it: Vede quell'elicottero nero appena decollato?"

translation.en: And I said, "Yes, yes."
translation.it: Risposi di sì.

translation.en: "That is passing by now? That's probably...
translation.it: "Quello che sta passando? Probabilmente

translation.en: the helicopter with him. But I have bad news for you,
translation.it: è lassù. Ma ho una brutta notizia,

translation.en: and you have to be strong.
translation.it: dev'essere forte.

translation.en: To free him out we had to cut his legs
translation.it: Per liberarlo abbiamo dovuto tagliargli

translation.en: and he is in a very bad shape.
translation.it: le gambe ed è in pessime condizioni.

translation.en: One of his arms is also in very bad shape."
translation.it: Anche una braccio è in pessime condizioni."

translation.en: I said, "Okay, it doesn't matter. Is he alive?
translation.it: Io dissi: "Fa niente, non importa. È vivo?

translation.en: I don't care about his legs, is he alive?"
translation.it: Non m'importa delle gambe, è vivo? "

translation.en: "Yes."
translation.it: "Sì."

translation.en: [Valentine] His mind was starting to go. He wasn't talking much anymore.
translation.it: La sua mente iniziava ad andare. Non parlava più molto.

translation.en: He was... You could hear his breathing was a lot more erratic
translation.it: Era... Il suo respiro era più erratico

translation.en: and, and, uh, irregular and stuff,
translation.it: e irregolare,

translation.en: and I just went over there and I continued to encourage him,
translation.it: e io continuai a incoraggiarlo,

translation.en: I tried to, uh, hold his hand,
translation.it: provai a tenergli la mano,

translation.en: and you know, lay next to him and put my head on him,
translation.it: sdraiarmi accanto a lui e poggiare la testa su di lui

translation.en: uh, so he'll know that somebody was there.
translation.it: per fargli sapere che c'era qualcuno.

translation.en: I went back over to talk to Sérgio, tell him we'll get you out next,
translation.it: Tornai a parlare con Sérgio, per dirgli che avremmo fatto uscire lui ora,

translation.en: he didn't reply to me. Shook him, he didn't reply to me.
translation.it: ma non rispondeva. Lo scossi, e non rispondeva.

translation.en: Felt for a pulse, and there wasn't one.
translation.it: Sentii il polso e non c'era.

translation.en: We weren't gonna get him out, and that kind of hit me like a ton of bricks.
translation.it: Non sarebbe uscito di lì, e la cosa mi colpì come una valanga di mattoni.

translation.en: [Larriera] I, I felt there is something wrong. I know there was something wrong.
translation.it: Sentivo che qualcosa non andava. Lo sapevo.

translation.en: I hear on the back...
translation.it: Sentii da dietro

translation.en: someone saying Sérgio's dead.
translation.it: qualcuno che diceva: "Sérgio è morto."

translation.en: Sérgio's dead. [sobs]
translation.it: "Sérgio è morto."

translation.en: [softly] I wanted to die.
translation.it: Volevo morire.

translation.en: He failed me. He really failed me.
translation.it: Mi aveva deluso. Davvero.

translation.en: I really believe God sent two miracles.
translation.it: Credevo davvero che Dio avesse mandato due miracoli.

translation.en: Bill and myself, we were his angels,
translation.it: Io e Bill eravamo i suoi angeli,

translation.en: and he failed both of us.
translation.it: e lui ci aveva delusi.

translation.en: And it hurt real bad.
translation.it: E mi fece molto male.

translation.en: I'm mad at him, but I'm also hurt for him,
translation.it: Ero arrabbiato con lui, ma soffrivo anche per lui,

translation.en: because he didn't believe in me. He didn't believe in a miracle.
translation.it: perché non aveva creduto in me. Non aveva creduto in un miracolo.

translation.en: We only asked him to stay alive, have the will to survive,
translation.it: Gli avevamo solo chiesto di sopravvivere, di trovare la forza,

translation.en: have the faith to survive and he didn't want to.
translation.it: avere la fede per sopravvivere, e non ha voluto.

translation.en: Maybe he's misconstruing where he's saying...
translation.it: Forse ha frainteso ciò che intendeva:

translation.en: you know, basically don't worry about me, get everybody else out first.
translation.it: "Non preoccupatevi per me, prima tutti gli altri."

translation.en: Maybe he's construing that as not a will to live.
translation.it: Forse lo interpreta come mancanza di volontà di vivere.

translation.en: I look at that as being pretty selfless.
translation.it: Io lo considero altruista.

translation.en: I don't think that's a lack of will to live, I think that's, you know,
translation.it: Non credo che sia una mancanza di voglia di vivere, credo che

translation.en: I think that's a pretty damn good thing.
translation.it: sia una cosa davvero buona.

translation.en: I told him, "I promise I'm gonna get you out." And I didn't.
translation.it: Gli avevo detto: "Ti prometto che ti farò uscire." E non è stato così.

translation.en: I felt almost, like, he knew I lied to him.
translation.it: Era come se sapesse che gli avevo mentito.

translation.en: To this day, it's probably the thing that bothers me the most is that
translation.it: Ancora oggi, forse la cosa che mi fa stare più male

translation.en: I truly felt that I'd get both of these guys out alive.
translation.it: è che avevo davvero pensato di farli uscire vivi entrambi.

translation.en: [Bremer] A soldier covered with sweat and dirt came over and he said,
translation.it: Un soldato coperto di sudore e terra si avvicinò e disse:

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, I'm very sorry, we tried to save Sérgio,
translation.it: "Signor Ambasciatore, mi dispiace molto, abbiamo cercato di salvare Sérgio,

translation.en: but he's dead.
translation.it: ma è morto."

translation.en: Now the press were clamoring for an interview.
translation.it: Ora la stampa chiedeva un'intervista.

translation.en: I could not say that I knew Sérgio was dead because
translation.it: Non potevo dire che sapevo che Sérgio era morto

translation.en: I couldn't have his family find out by my making a statement on television,
translation.it: perché la famiglia non poteva venirlo a sapere dalla televisione,

translation.en: so I basically lied.
translation.it: quindi ho mentito.

translation.en: [reporter] Excuse me, sir.
translation.it: Mi scusi, signore.

translation.en: Sérgio Vieira de Mello apparently also has been injured in this attack...
translation.it: Anche Sérgio Vieira de Mello è stato ferito in questo attacco...

translation.en: Yes, that's right. As of this time,
translation.it: Sì, è vero. Da questo momento,

translation.en: my dear friend Sérgio is somewhere back there.
translation.it: il mio caro amico Sergio è da qualche parte lì dentro.

translation.en: Uh, it may well be that he was the target of this attack.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere stato lui il bersaglio di questo attacco.

translation.en: The truck was parked in such a place, here in front of the building
translation.it: Il furgone era parcheggiato in modo tale

translation.en: that it had to affect his office which was in the second floor above us.
translation.it: da colpire il suo ufficio, che era al secondo piano sopra di noi.

translation.en: What strikes me about the rescue is just the utter indignity
translation.it: Cosa mi colpisce del salvataggio è l'oltraggio totale

translation.en: of Sérgio being left under the rubble for three and a half hours,
translation.it: di Sérgio lasciato sotto le macerie per tre ore e mezza,

translation.en: for them to be relying upon a lady's handbag and a curtain rope?
translation.it: di avere come attrezzatura solo una borsetta e a una corda?

translation.en: Are we kidding?
translation.it: Stiamo scherzando?

translation.en: This is the United States.
translation.it: Siamo negli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: And the degree to which the political planners of this war failed
translation.it: E i pianificatori politici di questa guerra fallirono nella misura in cui

translation.en: not only Sérgio and the UN officials and others who were killed that day,
translation.it: non solo Sérgio, i funzionari dell'ONU e altri furono uccisi quel giorno,

translation.en: but also their own soldiers who put their lives on the line in that way.
translation.it: ma anche i loro stessi soldati rischiarono la vita per la vita in quel modo.

translation.en: Terrible. Terrible.
translation.it: Terribile. Terribile.

translation.en: [Davie] He was lying on his flag, in the rubble.
translation.it: Era sdraiato sulla sua bandiera, tra le macerie.

translation.en: The United Nations flag.
translation.it: La bandiera delle Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: The, uh, the team...
translation.it: La squadra

translation.en: above then, uh, pulled...
translation.it: sopra di lui tirò

translation.en: and, uh, slowly we were able to take him up, uh,
translation.it: e, lentamente, riuscimmo a portarlo su

translation.en: up the shaft.
translation.it: dal pozzo.

translation.en: Gaby was up there and some of his other, uh, bodyguards, and, uh, and they...
translation.it: Gaby era lassù con le altre sue guardie del corpo

translation.en: took one of the stretchers and, uh,
translation.it: e presero una delle barelle

translation.en: and laid him on... Sorry.
translation.it: e lo posarono... Scusate.

translation.en: We put him on a stretcher.
translation.it: Lo misimo su una barella.

translation.en: We looked at him and we thought, "Everything he did in the world...
translation.it: Lo guardammo e pensammo: "Tutto quello che ha fatto nel mondo...

translation.en: for this."
translation.it: per questo."

translation.en: Impossible to understand.
translation.it: È impossibile da capire.

translation.en: [in English] We were standing up there in the second floor and the body came,
translation.it: Eravamo al secondo piano e il corpo arrivò,

translation.en: and, uh, it was put on a...
translation.it: e fu messo su...

translation.en: [exhales deeply] on a...
translation.it: su una...

translation.en: Uh, and I recognized him. His face was...
translation.it: E lo riconobbi. La sua faccia era

translation.en: entirely intact.
translation.it: del tutto intatta.

translation.en: And he looked handsome as usual, I remember.
translation.it: Ed era bello come sempre, ricordo.

translation.en: I received a call
translation.it: Mi telefonarono per dirmi

translation.en: that he had died.
translation.it: che era morto.

translation.en: I felt like crying, screaming
translation.it: Mi venne voglia di piangere, gridare,

translation.en: but my Grandmother was here
translation.it: ma c'era mia nonna

translation.en: and she didn't know.
translation.it: e lei non lo sapeva.

translation.en: She didn't know anything.
translation.it: Non sapeva niente.

translation.en: So I controlled myself as much as possible,
translation.it: Quindi mi controllai il più possibile,

translation.en: went to the bedroom and cried for a bit
translation.it: andai in camera da letto e piansi per un po ',

translation.en: then pulled my head together and took care of it.
translation.it: poi mi riscossi e pensai a dirgielo.

translation.en: That was when my world collapsed inside my head.
translation.it: Nella mia testa il mio mondo crollò.

translation.en: [voice breaking] To have a son like that
translation.it: Avere un figlio così

translation.en: with such good qualities
translation.it: con tante belle qualità

translation.en: and it ends like that.
translation.it: e vederlo finire così.

translation.en: I miss him immensely.
translation.it: Mi manca immensamente.

translation.en: Now, I can't say I've come out of the tunnel,
translation.it: Non posso dire di essere uscito dal tunnel,

translation.en: but I'm walking.
translation.it: ma sto camminando.

translation.en: And often I go to the Cemetery of Kings
translation.it: E spesso vado al cimitero dei re,

translation.en: where Sérgio's body is buried
translation.it: dove è sepolto il corpo di Sérgio

translation.en: and I talk to him.
translation.it: e parlo con lui.

translation.en: Now he's up in there in the sky
translation.it: Ora è lassù nel cielo

translation.en: and certainly still trying to save some people up there.
translation.it: e di sicuro cerca ancora di salvare qualcuno lassù.

translation.en: I know one day I'll meet him again.
translation.it: So che un giorno lo rivedrò.

translation.en: But I really can't forgive the people who did this to him.
translation.it: Ma non posso davvero perdonare chi gli ha fatto questo.

translation.en: [in English] I was really impressed with his stoicism.
translation.it: Il suo stoicismo mi colpì davvero.

translation.en: Never asked about himself, he asked about others, you know.
translation.it: Non chiese mai di sé, ma degli altri.

translation.en: Never asked for anything for himself in the way of pain medicine.
translation.it: Non chiese mai degli antidolorifici.

translation.en: He was always asking, "Take care of the others,"
translation.it: Non faceva che dire: "Occupatevi degli altri."

translation.en: and I thought somebody should know that.
translation.it: E pensavo che qualcuno dovesse saperlo.

translation.en: I didn't know who to contact, I didn't know where he was from.
translation.it: Non sapevo a chi rivolgermi, non sapevo da dove venisse.

translation.en: I just knew his boss was Kofi Annan.
translation.it: Sapevo solo che il suo capo era Kofi Annan.

translation.en: So that night on my broken and battered laptop computer,
translation.it: Così quella sera, sul mio computer rotto e malconcio,

translation.en: I wrote a letter to Kofi Annan.
translation.it: scrissi una lettera a Kofi Annan.

translation.en: 19th August, 2003.
translation.it: 19 agosto 2003.

translation.en: [sniffles] You know, I'm not gonna get through this.
translation.it: Sapete, non ce la faccio.

translation.en: "Subject: Sérgio Vieira de Mello.
translation.it: "Oggetto: Sérgio Vieira de Mello.

translation.en: As you are painfully aware, at approximately 1630 today local time,
translation.it: Come purtroppo saprà, intorno alle 1630 ora locale,

translation.en: a horrible disaster occurred
translation.it: si è verificato un terribile disastro

translation.en: [voice breaks] at the UN headquarters in Baghdad.
translation.it: al quartier generale dell'ONU a Baghdad.

translation.en: I was the first US soldier to arrive on the scene, and the sight was catastrophic.
translation.it: Sono stato il primo soldato americano ad arrivare e la scena era catastrofica.

translation.en: Unfortunately, Mr. de Mello passed away.
translation.it: Purtroppo, il signor de Mello è morto.

translation.en: While there is no good way to die, it says a lot about a man's character
translation.it: Anche se non c'è un bel modo di morire, dice molto sul carattere di un uomo

translation.en: when his last thoughts are for his family, his co-workers,
translation.it: quando i suoi ultimi pensieri sono per la sua famiglia, i suoi colleghi,

translation.en: and his country, or in this case, the UN.
translation.it: il suo Paese o, in questo caso, le Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: I'm truly sorry we could not
translation.it: Mi dispiace di non aver potuto mantenere

translation.en: have kept our promise to get him out alive.
translation.it: la promessa di farlo uscire vivo.

translation.en: The UN is fortunate to have people of this caliber working for them.
translation.it: Le Nazioni Unite sono fortunate ad avere persone di questo calibro.

translation.en: I salute all of them
translation.it: Rendo onore a tutti loro

translation.en: and hope that your mission in Iraq will conclude successfully.
translation.it: e spero che la vostra missione in Iraq si concluda con successo.

translation.en: Mr. de Mello was a humanitarian of the first order.
translation.it: Il signor de Mello era un filantropo di prim'ordine.

translation.en: He will be hard to be replaced."
translation.it: Sarà difficile sostituirlo."

translation.en: [Kofi Annan] Today we share our shock and sorrow
translation.it: Oggi condividiamo lo shock e il dolore

translation.en: at the loss of people we loved.
translation.it: per la perdita delle persone che amavamo.

translation.en: All of them leave a huge void.
translation.it: Tutti lasciano un vuoto enorme.

translation.en: Raid, Leen, Ihsan, Emaad, and Basim,
translation.it: Raid, Leen, Ihsan, Emaad e Basim,

translation.en: finally, Sérgio, my dear friend.
translation.it: e infine Sérgio, il mio caro amico.

translation.en: Why did you never seem tired
translation.it: Perché non sembravi mai stanco

translation.en: while even working 18-hour days?
translation.it: anche quando lavoravi 18 ore al giorno?

translation.en: Why did you never look crumpled
translation.it: Perché non sembravi mai stressato

translation.en: even after an 18-hour flight?
translation.it: dopo 18 ore di volo?

translation.en: Why were you never sick?
translation.it: Perché non eri mai malato?

translation.en: Why were you never grumpy?
translation.it: Perché non eri mai scontroso?

translation.en: And you were the only top official in the UN known to everyone
translation.it: Ed eri l'unico alto funzionario dell'ONU noto a tutti

translation.en: by his first name.
translation.it: con il nome proprio.

translation.en: Even to those who didn't know you personally
translation.it: Anche per coloro che non ti conoscevano,

translation.en: you were always just Sérgio.
translation.it: sei sempre stato solo Sérgio.

translation.en: [Power] It is heartening that around the world,
translation.it: È incoraggiante che in tutto il mondo,

translation.en: whether in the United Nations missions
translation.it: sia nelle missioni delle Nazioni Unite

translation.en: or in humanitarian organizations or in governments,
translation.it: che nelle organizzazioni umanitarie o nei governi

translation.en: you do have individuals who ask themselves
translation.it: ci siano persone che si chiedono

translation.en: what would Sérgio do.
translation.it: cosa farebbe Sérgio.

translation.en: The one answer that they know he would give is,
translation.it: L'unica risposta che avrebbe di certo dato era:

translation.en: "Get out of the capital and go out into the world
translation.it: "Esci dalla capitale e vai nel mondo

translation.en: and figure out what's happening.
translation.it: e scopri cosa sta succedendo.

translation.en: Figure out what's making people tick.
translation.it: Scopri cosa muove le persone.

translation.en: Respect the dignity of the human beings whose lives are at stake here.
translation.it: Rispetta la dignità degli esseri umani le cui vite sono in gioco.

translation.en: Don't treat them as a model if there is a mass.
translation.it: Non trattarli come modello se c'è una massa.

translation.en: Engage the bad guys.
translation.it: Dialoga con i cattivi.

translation.en: Be a man of action,
translation.it: Sii un uomo d'azione,

translation.en: but also never stop being a man of reflection."
translation.it: ma non smettere mai di essere un uomo di riflessione."

translation.en: [Larriera] I wish I could have an elastic time.
translation.it: Vorrei poter avere un tempo elastico.

translation.en: To be able to go back to the past and stretch out some special moments
translation.it: Riuscire a tornare al passato e allungare al massimo

translation.en: to a maximum.
translation.it: dei momenti speciali.

translation.en: Now we know where that, uh, those times are finished and, uh...
translation.it: Ora sappiamo dove sono finiti quei momenti e...

translation.en: and... they won't happen again.
translation.it: e non si ripeteranno più.

translation.en: When I finally made it back to Brazil, I went to this spot.
translation.it: Quando finalmente sono tornata in Brasile, sono andata in questo posto.

translation.en: The spot where we will always arrive
translation.it: Il punto in cui andavamo sempre

translation.en: every time we would hit the ground in Brazil,
translation.it: ogni volta che mettevamo piede in Brasile

translation.en: and go straight into the water at the sea.
translation.it: e andavamo dritti a mare.

translation.en: I really felt the strength of his spirit and the kindness of his spirit
translation.it: Ho sentito che la forza del suo spirito e la gentilezza del suo spirito

translation.en: were right there.
translation.it: erano proprio lì.

translation.en: That's where I feel that... that Sérgio is now.
translation.it: Sento che Sérgio è lì ora.

translation.en: And where I feel that, uh, he really, really rests forever.
translation.it: E sento che è lì che riposa per sempre.

translation.en: [Sérgio] My message is very simple.
translation.it: Il mio messaggio è semplicissimo.

translation.en: Never forget that the real challenges
translation.it: Non dimenticate mai che le vere sfide

translation.en: and the real rewards of serving the United Nations
translation.it: e le vere ricompense di servire le Nazioni Unite

translation.en: are out there in the field,
translation.it: sono là fuori sul campo,

translation.en: where people are suffering, where people need you.
translation.it: dove la gente soffre, dove la gente ha bisogno di voi.

translation.en: So, good luck. Welcome to the organization,
translation.it: Quindi, buona fortuna. Benvenuti nell'organizzazione,

translation.en: and here we are to help you in any way we can.
translation.it: e noi siamo qui per aiutarvi in ogni modo possibile.

translation.en: All the best.
translation.it: Auguri.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.it: Va bene.
